storyInfo: The Karlan Saintess fends off opponents from each side, all for a short but sweet break where she can offload the burdens of the Saintess and be Pramanix.

attributes.content: By Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: By Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Crowd of Elders

attributes.content: I'm very sorry, but I've gathered you here today not for the study of scriptures, but for more mundane concerns.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: A Kazimierz trade representative has requested a meeting with the Saintess of Karlan. May I have your thoughts?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Preposterous! How can an outsider be allowed to meet the Saintess on a whim?
attributes.name: Solemn Elder

attributes.content: Moreover, Karlan will not tolerate outsiders treading upon her land.
attributes.name: Solemn Elder

attributes.content: True. If we welcomed secular matters into the Vine-Bear Court, I fear it would unnecessarily disturb the peace of all present.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: But as Kjerag's administrator, declining their request would inevitably harm our diplomatic efforts.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: It was always Enciodes's role to discuss business with outsiders. This is the wish of a mere businessman. Moreover, wanting to chat with the Saintess is inappropriate in itself.
attributes.name: Solemn Elder

attributes.content: I'm afraid you're wrong. The General Chamber of Commerce's sway in Kazimierz cannot be belittled.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: On top of which, I'm worried they will leverage their developed economy and enormous capital to pressure us into submitting to unfavorable contract terms.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: A GCC representative being sent to Kjerag signifies their desire to partner with us on multiple fronts.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: More importantly, this requested audience shows obvious intent far beyond the commercial.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: A contract with Karlan Trade was only the beginning.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Enciodes is only leader of the Silverashes, after all. The weight of his promises and guarantees could never rival mine.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: If you should personally meet an outsider, Saintess... such action alone would be weighty enough.
attributes.name: Kindly Elder

attributes.content: My view exactly.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: So you have resolved to bring an outsider into the Vine-Bear Court?
attributes.name: Solemn Elder

attributes.content: No. Karlan is still Karlan, and the Vine-Bear Court is sacred ground within Kjerag. I would not wish to displease Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Thus, I will descend the mountain to receive Kazimierz's representative.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: That's...
attributes.name: Solemn Elder

attributes.content: Descending merely to bend to an outsider's rudeness—this is beyond improper.
attributes.name: Solemn Elder

attributes.content: Even our own devout citizens are hard-pressed to glimpse the Saintess. Why should this faithless outsider be allowed to meet her so casually?
attributes.name: Solemn Elder

attributes.content: Hm. I agree that he should be made to realize what an honor such a meeting is, so I will require that he attend with the worshippers at the upcoming ceremonies to pay respects to Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: As for Kjerag's people... Perhaps they will not understand their Saintess' decision this time, but eventually they will come to accept this shift.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: As our connection with the outside world grows more intimate by the day, I can only presume more such political figures will seek meetings here. And I must assume responsibility in kind.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Furthermore, I invite all Elders to weigh this matter too. No doubt you're all aware of the potential consequences of indulging Enciodes in his business.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: In exchange for industrial technology, Karlan Trade has signed many an unfavorable contract for Kjerag, this much is certain.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: I am not criticizing him; he was powerless to do anything else. However, my hope is that circumstances will gradually become more advantageous for us over time.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Surely Kjeragandr, who protects our people, would wish for this too.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Enciodes, Enciodes... If not for him, Kjerag wouldn't be so... *sigh*.
attributes.name: Solemn Elder

attributes.content: Now, now. Most people don't spend their lives looking out over snowy mountains.
attributes.name: Kindly Elder

attributes.content: We're all old fuddy-duddies by now. What's the harm in letting the youngsters live more comfortable lives?
attributes.name: Kindly Elder

attributes.content: However, Saintess, I'm afraid you have a difficult road ahead of you.
attributes.name: Kindly Elder

attributes.content: That's fine by me. Between the care of my maids and the protection of the Silverashes' soldiers, I have little to worry about.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: And you have no need to fret over the ordeals of the conference table... Kjeragandr will bless Her people.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Whew—this place is freezing.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: I can’t remember the last time I went somewhere I could see my breath.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Man, I just wanted to see some snow. If I knew this place was so freaking chilly, I wouldn't have applied for Kjerag fieldwork.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Eh, at least I'm just here to meet someone, and HR said I can call it off if they don't show up by 4 PM.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Applying for a post and then missing the appointment? Who does this guy think he is?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Might as well check the file... 'Pramanix'. Derived from 'first snow'. Chilly name, too. Those clothes look pretty snug though.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Ah, whatever, I'll go ask if they sell any heat patches around here.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Hey, sir, do you stock any heat patches?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Yes, yes, coming—heat what now? I didn't quite catch that.
attributes.name: Shopkeep

attributes.content: You must be a tourist from afar. You want some nice warm tea, I'm guessing?
attributes.name: Shopkeep

attributes.content: It's pretty cold here, no? Some tourists say they could freeze to death, others say it's nothing special.
attributes.name: Shopkeep

attributes.content: I'll pour you some tea while you take a look around.
attributes.name: Shopkeep

attributes.content: Uh, okay...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Whew, this place sure does have everything. Never seen any of it before either.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Here, get some tea in you for now. This is what keeps us going when we cross the snowfields here.
attributes.name: Shopkeep

attributes.content: Oh, sure. Thanks.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: So where are you from?
attributes.name: Shopkeep

attributes.content: Um, Rhodes Island...?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Rings a bell... but I can't put a face to the name, as it were. Tourists are always coming and going, you know.
attributes.name: Shopkeep

attributes.content: (The person in that portrait strikes me as kinda familiar though...)
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Who ever knew the outside world was so gosh darn huge? I've a mind to see it myself, once I save up enough cash.
attributes.name: Shopkeep

attributes.content: (Let me take that photo out again.)
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: First time in Kjerag? Or repeat visitor? We do sell souvenirs...
attributes.name: Shopkeep

attributes.content: Sorry, but can I ask a weird question? Do a lot of people in Kjerag look like the one in this picture?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: What in the...? This is our Saintess, you know. We'd be in trouble if there were any lookalikes running around.
attributes.name: Shopkeep

attributes.content: *cough*, *cough* *cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Times were, the Saintess only had a few portraits, each hung in front of a clan's home. Their subjects would go in person to pray to it.
attributes.name: Shopkeep

attributes.content: If I'm honest, no one ever knew whether the portraits looked anything like the Saintess. Commoners like us'd only get to see her once a year at most, at the Ceremony.
attributes.name: Shopkeep

attributes.content: And that's from across a sea of people in the square. One glimpse a mile away.
attributes.name: Shopkeep

attributes.content: The chance to hear the Saintess' bell, to receive Kjeragandr's blessings, that was enough for us.
attributes.name: Shopkeep

attributes.content: But times change. Tourists started coming in, and Sir Enciodes learned an awful lot of outsiders were curious about the Saintess, so he called on everyone to make all these portraits, embroideries, and statues.
attributes.name: Shopkeep

attributes.content: Of course, he'd make sure the portraits were accurate too. After all, he gets to meet the Saintess herself all the time.
attributes.name: Shopkeep

attributes.content: I mean, she's his own little sister, so of course he knows her well, yeah?
attributes.name: Shopkeep

attributes.content: Ha, I never knew...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: So, hypothetically speaking, what would happen if the Saintess left Kjerag?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Huh? How would she? She hardly ever even comes down from Karlan.
attributes.name: Shopkeep

attributes.content: And when she does, it's because something big's happened.
attributes.name: Shopkeep

attributes.content: Hey, boy, you'd never believe me if I told you Kjerag is blessed by Kjeragandr, would you? None of you tourists do.
attributes.name: Shopkeep

attributes.content: Er, I'd say I'm closer to agnostic...?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Now listen here. My business is only around thanks to Kjeragandr's miracles, brought about by the Saintess.
attributes.name: Shopkeep

attributes.content: I had barely opened my shop last year when they started fighting.
attributes.name: Shopkeep

attributes.content: 'They' being...?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: *Sigh* The three clans, wouldn't you know it. Strife and turmoil.
attributes.name: Shopkeep

attributes.content: They didn't just fight either, the worst part was when they blew up the railroad. No railroad, no tourists, no freight.
attributes.name: Shopkeep

attributes.content: I'd put all the savings I'd scraped together into this, and now my business was frozen over. What's a man to do?
attributes.name: Shopkeep

attributes.content: So I prayed day after day, begging Kjeragandr to show me a way.
attributes.name: Shopkeep

attributes.content: And sure as sure, my prayers came true. The Saintess descended, Kjeragandr created a miracle, and nobody dared try anything else.
attributes.name: Shopkeep

attributes.content: Ah, by Kjeragandr...
attributes.name: Shopkeep

attributes.content: So, just—I'm just curious here, what's the Saintess like in person? Is she, uh, easy to get along with?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Haha, listen to yourself.
attributes.name: Shopkeep

attributes.content: The Saintess is the recipient of Kjeragandr, so she'd have to be the forgiving sort.
attributes.name: Shopkeep

attributes.content: If I weren't so sure that Kjeragandr Herself is a forgiving god, how would I find it in me to even answer such an offensive question?
attributes.name: Shopkeep

attributes.content: Haha, yeah, sorry about that...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Thanks, sir. I'll take one of your cloaks.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Er, just a normal one, please. It doesn't need the Saintess embroidered on it... Normal, thanks.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: It's been such a pleasure meeting with you, but I'm sorry, I'm afraid I must cut this short.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: The Saintess' daily meditation is soon, and I cannot neglect it.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: No, no, I'm the one who should be sorry for disturbing your routine. Please, do as you always do.
attributes.name: Kazimierz Representative

attributes.content: To be honest, I wasn't actually expecting to get to meet the Karlan Saintess on this visit.
attributes.name: Kazimierz Representative

attributes.content: I'm more than happy to show myself, given Kazimierz's interest in mutually beneficial exchange with Kjerag.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: And I'd imagine that for the Kazimierz General Chamber of Commerce, successfully reaching Kjerag's Saintess is itself a form of provocation.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Meaning...?
attributes.name: Kazimierz Representative

attributes.content: Before too long, the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi Kazimierz will attempt to contact Kjerag as well.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: ...You're quite familiar with us.
attributes.name: Kazimierz Representative

attributes.content: I assume you would welcome such a development then?
attributes.name: Kazimierz Representative

attributes.content: This is but a necessary step in Kjerag's foreign outreach. If I had to say, I can only hope the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi's representative will be as amicable and sincere regarding mutual benefit as you were.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: You flatter me.
attributes.name: Kazimierz Representative

attributes.content: If future dealings between Kjerag and the KGCC will have the support of the Saintess, I see nothing but smooth sailing ahead.
attributes.name: Kazimierz Representative

attributes.content: May Kjeragandr bless you.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Oh dear, it's almost 4 PM already...
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Thank you for making this journey, Saintess.
attributes.name: Karlan Trade Manager

attributes.content: An outsider was so bold as to seek audience with you, and not only did you forego criticism, you made an exception to meet him. You are truly generous.
attributes.name: Karlan Trade Manager

attributes.content: We at Karlan Trade are deeply ashamed that we could not settle the matter ourselves, forcing you be personally involved.
attributes.name: Karlan Trade Manager

attributes.content: We will strive to ensure no such offense to Kjeragandr occurs ever again.
attributes.name: Karlan Trade Manager

attributes.content: Please, don't mind it. The Saintess is Kjeragandr's chosen envoy, after all; it's only right for me to be present for diplomatic affairs.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: She is forgiving, and I descended the mountain in following Her decree.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Yes... may we be grateful for Kjeragandr's blessing.
attributes.name: Karlan Trade Manager

attributes.content: The procession of burdenbeasts is ready outside. Our Silverash soldiers will see you back to the Vine-Bear Court.
attributes.name: Karlan Trade Manager

attributes.content: That won't be necessary. I still have other arrangements, and I'd rather they not wait for me in the snow.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: I... worry that Sir Enciodes would reprimand us for our etiquette, in neglecting the Saintess.
attributes.name: Karlan Trade Manager

attributes.content: Enciodes... Kjeragandr does not place blame, and nor should Her people.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: The Saintess' daily meditation awaits. Please, go on and return.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Very well. My apologies.
attributes.name: Karlan Trade Manager

attributes.content: May Kjeragandr bless you.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Phew... finally over. I need to hurry to where we agreed to meet...
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Enciodes is so annoying, choosing this moment to mess up my plans.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Hmph. If anyone else tries to stop me, forget the excuses, I'll just freeze them on the spot.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: In any case, nobody would ever guess where I'm going, not even him. They just want to keep me shut away in the Vine-Bear Court again.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Indeed, it's time for the Saintess to do her homework.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: But for now, I'm just Enya.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Oh, wait, no. For now, I'm Pramanix.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: '...I have other matters I must attend to on this descent, beyond meeting the Kazimierz representative.'
attributes.name: Solemn Elder

attributes.content: 'For the following half-month, I must regrettably ask that all affairs of the Vine-Bear Court be entrusted to the Elders.'
attributes.name: Solemn Elder

attributes.content: Was this letter truly left by the Saintess herself?
attributes.name: Solemn Elder

attributes.content: We've seen her annotating the scriptures for so many years. I would think we can recognize her handwriting.
attributes.name: Kindly Elder

attributes.content: It seems she's had this in mind for a while now.
attributes.name: Kindly Elder

attributes.content: This is an outrage, I tell you, an outrage!
attributes.name: Solemn Elder

attributes.content: If it were known that she has not merely descended, but went missing for half an entire month, what of the dignity the Vine-Bear Court? Of the Saintess herself?
attributes.name: Solemn Elder

attributes.content: Kjeragandr may yet bring Her fury upon us all.
attributes.name: Solemn Elder

attributes.content: Now, now. The Saintess is the one who receives Kjeragandr's decree. Should she say that She permits it, then we can only trust in her.
attributes.name: Kindly Elder

attributes.content: Until she returns, we must assert that the Saintess is meditating indoors and is not taking visitors.
attributes.name: Kindly Elder

attributes.content: Oh, Enya, though. That child has always had her own opinions. Whatever she's descended to do, I'm sure she has her reasons.
attributes.name: Kindly Elder

attributes.content: When has she ever failed to win us over, after all?
attributes.name: Kindly Elder

attributes.content: *Sigh* Enough. I've more or less decided how we're going to handle visitors.
attributes.name: Solemn Elder

attributes.content: 'Head in and take the second alley from the restaurant selling stew.' Should be here...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: It'll be four o'clock in five minutes. Still don't see anyone, huh.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Lemme just check the photo again... Not that I'd mistake the Karlan Saintess for anyone else, though.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Man, I bet this alley's the kind you enter on foot and leave on a stretcher...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Don't turn around.
Waugh! I surrender, I'm just a tourist, I've got no money on me, I'm estranged from my family, you won't get anything out of killing me—
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Shh, quiet. Who are you?
Er, I just said I'm just a tourist...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Company?
Rhodes Island, a pharmaceutical firm, principally treating Oripathy. Probably not a great market presence here...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: You'd better not whip that knife out.
If you stabbed the Saintess, the charges alone would crush you.
attributes.name: Pramanix

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*... Huge apologies, Saintess of Karlan! By Kjeragandr! I beg you not to visit Her wrath upon me!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: No harm, no foul. As agreed, I'm here to lend my aid to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Pramanix

attributes.content: I see you even learned the words of praise we always use in Kjerag?
attributes.name: Pramanix

attributes.content: Phew. You scared the living daylights out of me. I just said whatever holy words came to mind...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: And now I'm even more scared that I nearly pulled a knife on you.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: No, but see, if even you recognize me as the Saintess, obviously anyone from Kjerag would too, right?
attributes.name: Pramanix

attributes.content: So if this man all wrapped up in black wasn't from Rhodes Island, but just some other weirdo, and they saw me, then...
attributes.name: Pramanix

attributes.content: Wouldn't there be rumors about the Saintess running around on her own?
attributes.name: Pramanix

attributes.content: So I had to approach from behind, and confirm your identity first.
attributes.name: Pramanix

attributes.content: This is NOT what I expected from the Saintess everyone's always talking about...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Hm? But I'm Pramanix, not the Saintess. It's normal that we're nothing alike, right?
attributes.name: Pramanix

attributes.content: And just so you know, if you ever call me 'Saintess' aboard Rhodes Island, I'll freeze your mouth shut.
attributes.name: Pramanix

attributes.content: Haha, okay...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Well, it just hit four. If you were any later, I might've already left.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Oh, but I've got a whole pile of people that still want me here. Who knows what trouble awaits us on the way back?
attributes.name: Pramanix

attributes.content: Right, I heard the Saintess doesn't get to descend whenever she wants.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Mhm, but if an ambassador comes calling, what choice does she have?
attributes.name: Pramanix

attributes.content: That's why before Kjarr went to Rhodes Island, I asked her to make a quick detour to speak to a Kazimierz rep visiting Kjerag.
attributes.name: Pramanix

attributes.content: Through her, I made a little suggestion.
attributes.name: Pramanix

attributes.content: And so, a few days later, news of his request to meet the Saintess was reported to the Vine-Bear Court.
attributes.name: Pramanix

attributes.content: You worked with him to get down the mountain?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: But not just for fun, of course.
attributes.name: Pramanix

attributes.content: Without this opportunity, outsiders wouldn't even know Kjerag had a Saintess, let alone that she was so willing to meet them. They'd think we were only Karlan Trade.
attributes.name: Pramanix

attributes.content: Heh. If Enciodes had his way, then that just might...
attributes.name: Pramanix

attributes.content: Wait, I thought Enciodes was your—
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: —Come to think it, I've never left Kjerag before.
attributes.name: Pramanix

attributes.content: (Whoops. Guess that's a touchy subject.)
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Yeah, I'd never left Victoria before I boarded Rhodes Island either.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Good thing we've got chefs from all over Terra. You'll never go hungry, at least.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: But still, it's hard not to get homesick. Regional specialties just aren't the same as your family's home cooking.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Have you ever been back, then?
attributes.name: Pramanix

attributes.content: Uh, where'd that come from...?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: I'm Infected, so I wouldn't be welcome there anyway. Can't go home even if I wanted to.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Oh, I'm sorry.
attributes.name: Pramanix

attributes.content: I was just a little curious, since the most I met were people who came home from abroad.
attributes.name: Pramanix

attributes.content: One spent years outside of Kjerag, and by the time he came back, I didn't recognize him one bit.
attributes.name: Pramanix

attributes.content: There's the kicker. I'm guessing he was young, and then got all grown up in the blink of an eye, right?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Exactly. But he didn't just get taller, his shoulders got broader too... and his way of thinking was completely different.
attributes.name: Pramanix

attributes.content: Hardly anyone used to leave Kjerag, so I always wondered what it was like out there. Just what it was he saw, you know?
attributes.name: Pramanix

attributes.content: And if every person who left would be changed just as much.
attributes.name: Pramanix

attributes.content: Let's get a move on. I'm dying to get to Rhodes Island and see Kjarr again.
attributes.name: Pramanix

attributes.content: Sure, let's go.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Oh yeah, when someone told me you were the Saintess, I picked up this cloak for you.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Put up the hood and it'll cover your face. That'll keep anyone from noticing you at a glance.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Wow, you're very thoughtful.
attributes.name: Pramanix

attributes.content: Could you hold my book for a moment? I'll put it on now.
attributes.name: Pramanix

attributes.content: Sure—'A Brief History of the Battle of the Four Emperors'?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Oh, the Doctor lent me that book.
attributes.name: Pramanix

attributes.content: My room is still piled up with what the Doctor gave me for light reading. I'm planning to return this one once I'm done, and we can talk about the rest another time.
attributes.name: Pramanix

attributes.content: Speaking of which, I suppose I've never actually met the Doctor... I hope they won't make me do any work. This is supposed to be a vacation, after all.
attributes.name: Pramanix

attributes.content: Operators are supposed to work at Rhodes Island though...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Ah, whatever. Here's to a pleasant holiday for you.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator
